mapper.insert: insert into sponsor (sno, relation, name, sex, age, mPhone) values (#{sno}, #{relation}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{mPhone})
mapper.update: update sponsor set relation=#{relation}, name=#{name}, age=#{age}, mPhone=#{mPhone} where sponsorNum = #{sponsorNum}
mapper.select: select * from sponsor order by sponsorNum desc
